name: Crabrades #4097
description: The King of Crabs has begun a campaign to make it known by all how cool crabs are. Together with 9,999 crabgrammatically generated crabrades the King is ready to fight for crabkind. Join us at https://crabrades.com/ to join the fight for the liberation of the crustacean nation! Crabkind will one day have their time in the sun again.
